department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply of one (1) Terrestrial 3D Laser Scanner
description: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be be submitted by 2023-02-17 at 15:00 AST. All bids submitted after 15:00 AST will result in the bid being declared nonresponsive.
full_summary:
# **F5561-220250: Terrestrial 3D Scanning System RFP**
[The following solicitation is for) a Terrestrial 3D Laser Scanner](#what-scanner-do-we-require)

## **|Relevant Details**

*   **Reference Number:** [`WS3724990810`-`Doc3845101157`](#reference-number)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

##  **|Locations Involved**

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+   11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, GATINEAU (Québec) K1A 0S5
*   **End User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
	+   200 Kent Street, Ottawa (Ontario) K1A 0E6

## **|Concerns & Limitations**

*   Note on Closing Time: Although the Ariba Discovery posting has been modified, it is suggested that one disregard this element and only treat the CanadaBuys posting closing time as the time-sensitivity point for this solicitation.  
*   In Case of non-compliance in bid times [all bids submitted by] [after 15:00 AST] [can be defined as] non-responsive bids.
